extendedInfo.description: Premama Calendar DescriptionPremama Calendar is the application for all women who are pregnant!Entering and saving the last period and the expected delivery date, the calendar changes in color pink and pastel blue every 28days. (It is calculated 28days as a month of pregnancy.)Dotted line and number shows which week of pregnancy you are at. The remaining days until the delivery appears on the top-right of the calendar. When you save the next checkup date, the hospital icon appears automatically on the calendar so you will never forget your next appointment!You can save your daily health condition and checkup log, and see everything in the list.You can also save ultrasound photos on the calendar and the list so that you can see the growth of the embryo and the fetus. Personal DataEnter your basic information here. The contents of information is as following. The calendar will appear after entering the information.Baby's name: If you have already decided the baby's name, enter the name.  Multiple entries allowed with line break.Hospital button: Select the date first on the calendar then tap this button to move to the checkup log screen.Today button: Go back to the today's date.Left&Right button: Move the date right and left.List button: Tap this button to select the list from 1 to 4.Graph button: Tap this button to see the graph of your weight change.Select the date on the calendarâTap "Hospital button" then move to this screen. You can save your checkup log and see everything in the list. You can also send the log by email.Select the date of the calendar âãTap the place where it says " Touch here and enter.". Then move to the Health Condition screen. 1)Pink & pastel blue of calendar's date: The calendar changes in color pink and pastel blue every 28days.(It is calculated 28days as a month of pregnancy.)2)Blue triangle: It displays from the start date and the end date of the last period.3)Dotted line and number: It shows each week of pregnancy.4)Camera&Pregnancy woman button: Tap here to save your pregnancy photo.ï¼You can save any photo you like.5)Camera&Pre-born baby button:Tap here to save the latest ultrasound photos. ï¼You can save any photo you like.When you tap "List" button, the pop-up screen appears. You can select list from 1 to 3 to see each list.List1: Tap this button to see the list of health condition.List2:Tap this button to see the list of regular checkup.List3:Tap this button to see the list of pregnancy photos.List4: Tap this button to see the list of ultrasound photos.Ultrasound photo1&2: When you save the ultrasound photo on the calendar, the same photo is displayed in Photo1. Tap Photo2 then the pop-up appears. You can select "Album" or"Camera" to upload and save the photo.Pregnancy photo1&2:When you save the pregnancy photo on the calendar, the same photo is displayed in Photo1. Tap Photo2 then the pop-up appears. You can select "Album" or"Camera" to upload and save the photo.â»Pay ver No adsâ»WVGA 480x800 or higher.
